overview:
Glen Kazerman is a senior professional with more than 20 years experience in the area of sales, marketing and business development, largely in technology and services industries. He has a proven record in sales, marketing and market development using strong business, entrepreneurial and technical skills. Glen has demonstrated success where performance resulted in successful initial public offerings and the sale and acquisition of several companies.
